instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Retina Touchbar 15 inch rebooting after sleepmode
threads.message: Hello, I have a client who has a touchbar 15 inch, the high end model with Radeon 560. This machine works fine, however when closing the lid in sleep mode, after 15 seconds when opening again, it shuts down and shows the message "unexpected shutdown". Reboots and then you can use it again. After every sleepmode, it will reboot. Did anyone see this issue before? No liquid spil on the board.

threads.title: Retina Touchbar 15 inch rebooting after sleepmode
threads.message:
Test another OSX installation first.
Also check it without touchbar connected.
Warranty lost?

threads.title: Retina Touchbar 15 inch rebooting after sleepmode
threads.message: I tried with external drive as well, same issue. The machine is out of warranty. Unfortunately the customer took it so I will only be able to try without touchbar if he return. Touchbar was working though.
